metadata.name: Exports Registry Key To an Alternate Data Stream
metadata.comment: Exports the target Registry key and hides it in the specified alternate data stream.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regedit.exe')))

output.summary: Exports the target Registry key and hides it in the specified alternate data stream.
